The amount of rewards that can be received for some quests has been increased.
The difficulty for making some Atelier Materials has been reduced.
Other minor bug fixes and feature improvements

- 7th Anniversary Event
- Buffs Added to Garden Items!
- Square event launch and feature improvements
- Other minor bug fixes.

- Square event launch and feature improvements
- The amount of rewards that can be received for some quests has been increased.
- Difficulty reduction for some quests
- Other minor bug fixes.

New Garden audio items!
Change your avatar's size with this new magic item!
Other minor bug fixes.

VIP ranks revamped
Charging and paid items revamped
Garden Weather items added
Bugs fixed and usability improved

Circle Missions!
Recycle Garden Items!
Bugs fixed and usability improved
Bugs fixed and usability improved

Square event scheduled to open!
Bugs fixed and usability improved

A new fashion revolution with new colorant items!
You can now personalize backgrounds using mood items.
Miscellaneous bug fixes.

Summer and sea-related SQUARE event coming soon!
Miscellaneous bug fixes.
We modified display problem on some items related to colorant items.

Butlers are here to steal your heart!
Fashionista Total Points have been improved and more rewards are now available.

It's already LINE PLAY's 8th anniversary! Watch out for awesome events!
Incredible upgrades have been made to the butlers!
Miscellaneous bug fixes.

Butler Skin Shop update! Check out the new charms of each butler!
A bit more special Select Shop to open soon!

Butler Skin Shop update! Check out the new charms of each butler!
A bit more special Select Shop to open soon!
Miscellaneous bug fixes.
Fixed various bugs.

Treasure Island is back! Take on various fishing quests and complete your collection!
New closet feature! Save your avatar's outfit and makeup in Styling!
Stay tuned for a special Easter event!
Permission pop-up added for new iOS 14 privacy feature (IDFA).
Miscellaneous bug fixes.

Riding Pet, which can take my Avatar and travel along, has been added.
Voice Collection with a collection of Butlers' voices has been added.
Butler Quest, which you can exchange designated rewards by Special Order of Butlers, has been added.
Treasure Island and user convenience have been improved.

A diary monitoring consent pop-up has been added.
We've improved some quests in the Treasure World.

New Treasure Island Square mini game to defeat the Boss Fish, 'Boss Raids,' has been added!
Main Pet at the Avatar Profile pop-up has been deleted.
Riding Pet and user experience has been improved.
